testcase.purpose: Test a speech job will generate the correct boundary events
Test that cancelling a speech job fires the right events
Test that pausing/resuming speech jobs works as expected
Test that passing an argument other than a SpeechSynthesisUtterance to speechSynthesis.speak throws a TypeError exception
Test that the basic mechanisms of speaking text work, including sending the job and receving the callback
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesisUtterance
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesis
Test SpeechGrammar interface
Test SpeechRecognition interface
Test SpeechRecognitionError interface
Check if SpeechGrammar constructor is valid
Check if SpeechGrammar object is extensible
Check if src attribute of SpeechGrammar exists
Check if weight attribute of SpeechGrammar exists
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList exists
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList without argument throws an exception
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList with all argument works properly
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList without optional argument works properly
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList exists
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList without argument throws an exception
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList with all argument works properly
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList without optional argument works properly
Check if SpeechGrammarList constructor is valid
Check if SpeechGrammarList object is extensible
Check if item method of SpeechGrammarList exists
Check if item method of SpeechGrammarList works properly without argument
Check if item method of SpeechGrammarList works properly with item index of grammar
Check if length attribute of webspeechGrammarList exists
Check if SpeechRecognition abort extra argument
Check if SpeechRecognition constructor
Check if SpeechRecognition continuous attribute
Test if the user agent must return zero or more final results representing multiple consecutive recognitions in response to starting recognition when the continuous attribute is set to true
Check if SpeechRecognition is extensible
Check if SpeechRecognition grammars attribute
Check if SpeechRecognition interimResults attribute
Test if interim results will be returned when the interim attribute is set to true
Check if SpeechRecognition lang attribute
Check if SpeechRecognition maxAlternatives attribute
Test if the maximum number of SpeechRecognitionAlternatives per result is maxAlternatives when maxAlternatives is set
Check if SpeechRecognition serviceURI attribute
Test getting an exception when calling start() in the Speech JavaScript API
Check if SpeechRecognition start extra argument
Check if SpeechRecognition start
Check if SpeechRecognition stop extra argument
Test checks if SpeechRecognition interface works well
Test if the confidence represents a numeric estimate between 0 and 1 of how confident the recognition system is that the recognition is correct
Check if error attribute exists in SpeechRecognitionError and a readonly attribute
Check if webspeechRecognitionError object is extensible
Check if message attribute exists in SpeechRecognitionError and a readonly attribute
Test if emma attribute is EMMA 1.0 representation of this result
Check if webspeechRecognitionEvent object is extensible
Test if the interpretation represents the semantic meaning from what the user said, current options are null or a copy of the transcript
Test if the resultIndex is set to the lowest index in the results array that has changed
Test SpeechRecognitionEvent interface
Test if the final boolean is set to true if this is the final time the speech service will return this particular index value
Test if SpeechRecognitionResult item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Test if the long attribute represents how many n-best alternatives are represented in the item array
Test if SpeechRecognitionResultList item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Test if the length attribute indicates how many results are represented in the item array
Check if cancel method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if webspeechSynthesis exists
Check if SpeechSynthesisGetter is extensible
Check if getVoices method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if getVoices method of SpeechSynthesis works properly
Check if pause method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if pause method of SpeechSynthesis changes state of pause
Check if paused attribute of SpeechSynthesis exists
Check if pending attribute of SpeechSynthesis exists
Check if resume method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if resume method of SpeechSynthesis returns value
Check if speak method of SpeechSynthesis without argument throws an exception
Check if speak method of SpeechSynthesis returns value
Check if speaking attribute of SpeechSynthesis exists
Test SpeechSynthesis interface
Test checks if SpeechSynthesis interface works well
Check if CharIndex attribute of SpeechSynthesisEvent is readOnly
Test if character index into the original utterance string that most closely approximates the current speaking position of the speech engine
Check if elapsedTime attribute of SpeechSynthesisEvent is readOnly
Check if SpeechSynthesisEvent is extensible
Check if name attribute of SpeechSynthesisEvent is readOnly
Test if name should return undefined for start event
Test SpeechSynthesisEvent interface
Test if the results exists and contains the array of all current recognition results for this session
Check if SpeechSynthesisGetter is NoInterfaceObject
Check if SpeechSynthesisUtterance constructor with text constructor supported
Test if onerror fired if there was an error that prevented successful speaking of this utterance
Check if lang attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exist and writable
Test if default to use the lang of the html document root element
Test if onmark fired when this utterance has begun to be spoken
Test if fired when and if this utterance is paused mid-utterance
Check if pitch attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exist and writable
Test SpeechSynthesisUtterance pitch value
Check if rate attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exist and writable
Test SpeechSynthesisUtterance rate value
Test if onresume fired when and if this utterance is resumed after being paused mid-utterance
Test if onstart fired when this utterance has begun to be spoken
Check if text attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exists and writable
Test if text can be a complete, well-formed SSML document
Check if voiceURI attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exist and writable
Check if volume attribute of SpeechSynthesisUtterance exist and writable
Test SpeechSynthesisUtterance volume value
Test SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface
Check if default attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoice is readOnly
Check if SpeechSynthesisVoice can be extended
Check if lang attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoice is readOnly
Check if localService attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoice is readOnly
Check if name attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoice is readOnly
Check if voiceURI attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoice is readOnly
Check if SpeechSynthesisVoiceList is extensible
Check if item method of SpeechSynthesisVoiceList exists
Test if SpeechSynthesisVoiceList item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Check if item method of SpeechSynthesisVoiceList throws exception when non optional argument missing
Check if item method of SpeechSynthesisVoiceList works properly
Check if length attribute of SpeechSynthesisVoiceList is readonly
